LanguageData.DMS_Civilian01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to a rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun] received a long period of survival training and physical exercise during the voyage. Compared to most people who live on this planet, [PAWN_pronoun] is fully prepared.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian01.title: Colonial Pioneer
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian02.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to a rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun] is one of the most experienced colonists in the colonization team and has participated in numerous successful and failed colonization projects throughout the life of colonization.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian02.title: Survival Expert
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian03.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to a rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun]'s job is to establish an functional forward outpost well in advance of the main colonization force and send signals back to show the fleet that the planet is still worth the long voyage.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian03.title: Colonial Guard
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian04.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to a rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun]'s duty is to conduct medical or chemical extermination of alien diseases and biological hazards respectively at forward outposts long before main settler forces arrive.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian04.title: Colonial Medic
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian05.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. Responsible for completing the ecological and species research on this planet before the arrival of the large colonial army, so that future colonization work will be much more smoother.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian05.title: Ecologist
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian06.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. Responsible for coordinating with the orbital detectors to complete the collection and labeling of geological data on the planet before the arrival of the main colonization group.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian06.title: Geologist
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian07.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. Responsible for the planning and construction of permanent and temporary residences at landing sites. Of course, must also have to learn to save [PAWN_pronoun] own life from attacks by hostile local natives.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian07.title: Colonial Architect
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian08.description: As we all know, most of the planets in the rimworlds are in a state of disorganized social organization, but the job of [PAWN_nameDef] is to establish good relations with these local indigenous people as much as possible on behalf of the colonial fleet, smoothening the facilitation of future colonization work with little problems as possible.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian08.title: Local Diplomat
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian09.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for caring for the plants in the community, and testing soil pH and moisture. Track growth and choose crops suitable for local conditions.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian09.title: Colonial farmer
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian10.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for hand forging tools and parts in a colony site where stamping printers were not allocated, and also developed knowledge of cutting and assembly machinery.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian10.title: Colonial mechanic
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian11.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been working with mines almost all [PAWN_pronoun] life, digging with machinery and explosives. Of course, sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] also has to dig with [PAWN_pronoun] own hands.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian11.title: Colonial miner
